title: Colours of the Deep
description: A University professor reports that three students who consumed Void-Wine at an off-campus party experienced vivid shared hallucinations — all three saw exactly the same vision of a city beneath the city. The professor considers this scientifically significant but dangerous.

turns.narrative: The three students are physically fine but deeply shaken. They each independently drew the same image — a vast underground space with towering arcane machinery and channels of glowing blue liquid. The detail is extraordinary in its consistency.
turns.choice_a: Interview each student separately to verify the consistency
turns.consequence_a: Every detail matches across all three interviews — the same archways, same machinery, same faint figure standing in the centre.
turns.choice_b: Examine the drawings and compare them to any known architectural records
turns.consequence_b: Professor Wex matches two of the drawn archways to Pre-Scourge architectural diagrams in the restricted section of the university library.

turns.narrative: The hallucination appears to be a genuine Void-echo — a phenomenon where Void-Wine users briefly perceive the Void layer beneath physical reality. What the students saw may actually exist somewhere under Emberheart.
turns.choice_a: Recommend the University fund an expedition to find the location
turns.consequence_a: Wex is excited. A proposal is drafted for a supervised academic expedition.
turns.choice_b: Warn Wex that pursuing this could be extremely dangerous and recommend suppressing the findings
turns.consequence_b: Wex reluctantly files the drawings in the restricted archive, marked 'Sensitive — Void-Cognition Study.'

turns.narrative: You also need to address the students' wellbeing after the experience.
turns.choice_a: Connect them with a specialist in Void-exposure counselling
turns.consequence_a: The students process the experience safely. Two of them become interested in Void-research as a career.
turns.choice_b: Advise them simply to avoid Void-Wine permanently
turns.consequence_b: All three agree immediately and with obvious relief. They clearly had no desire to repeat the experience.

expedition_proposed.description: Academic expedition proposal drafted for the underground space.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Academic expedition proposal drafted for the underground space.
